<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Macro compressed bit reversal table for 256 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// http://graphics.stanford.edu/~seander/bithacks.html#BitReverseTable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adfda5f0036e72030542a8eb8a1ff38a1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adfda5f0036e72030542a8eb8a1ff38a1">BitReverseTable256</a>&#91;256&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define R2(n) n, n + 2 &#42; 64, n + 1 &#42; 64, n + 3 &#42; 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define R4(n) R2(n), R2(n + 2 &#42; 16), R2(n + 1 &#42; 16), R2(n + 3 &#42; 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define R6(n) R4(n), R4(n + 2 &#42; 4), R4(n + 1 &#42; 4), R4(n + 3 &#42; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(0), <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(2), <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(1), <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#undef R2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#undef R4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#undef R6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Reverse the bits in \\p Val.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Val); ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    out&#91;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Val) - i) - 1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adfda5f0036e72030542a8eb8a1ff38a1">BitReverseTable256</a>&#91;in&#91;i&#93;&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::memcpy(&amp;Val, out, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Val));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: The following support functions use the &#95;32/&#95;64 extensions instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type overloading so that signed and unsigned integers can be used without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ambiguity.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Gets the maximum value for a N-bit unsigned integer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80bd4ec8a9b2f8e7d9d75ab708a55c2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80bd4ec8a9b2f8e7d9d75ab708a55c2">maxUIntN</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;= 64 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;integer width out of range&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; 64 is undefined behavior, so we can&#39;t do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; N) - 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without checking first that N != 64  But this works and doesn&#39;t have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch for N != 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unfortunately, shifting a uint64&#95;t right by 64 bit is undefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// behavior, so the condition on N == 0 is necessary. Fortunately, most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimizers do not emit branches for this check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (64 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Gets the minimum value for a N-bit signed integer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9a9168454d9535e1d4ef88fb4a3592d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9a9168454d9535e1d4ef88fb4a3592d">minIntN</a>(int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;= 64 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;integer width out of range&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UINT64&#95;C(1) + ~(UINT64&#95;C(1) &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> - 1));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compile time Log2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Valid only for positive powers of two.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a157580cd43622bf53270856bf51da098"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> kValue&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a157580cd43622bf53270856bf51da098">CTLog2</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(kValue &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a434f6a0d80fb13e4326e848a6391f057">llvm::isPowerOf2&#95;64</a>(kValue),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Value is not a valid power of 2&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1 + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a157580cd43622bf53270856bf51da098">CTLog2</a>&lt;kValue / 2&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1ad6a22183202b7c63fd7f2b3c6f6394"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1ad6a22183202b7c63fd7f2b3c6f6394">CTLog2&lt;1&gt;</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return the floor log base 2 of the specified value, -1 if the value is zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (32 bit edition.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Ex. Log2&#95;32(32) == 5, Log2&#95;32(1) == 0, Log2&#95;32(0) == -1, Log2&#95;32(6) == 2</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A and B are either alignments or offsets. Return the minimum alignment that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// may be assumed after adding the two together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T = common&#95;u</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;U, V&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59f98bbb1f440db8d5db1c8b5bd819f6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59f98bbb1f440db8d5db1c8b5bd819f6">MinAlign</a>(U <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, V <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The largest power of 2 that divides both A and B.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace &quot;-Value&quot; by &quot;1+~Value&quot; in the following commented code to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MSVC warning C4146</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    return (A | B) &amp; -(A | B);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &amp; (1 + ~(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Fallback when arguments aren&#39;t integral.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab3b23d3c8c5c910df534a80ce9772495"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59f98bbb1f440db8d5db1c8b5bd819f6">MinAlign</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns the power of two which is greater than or equal to the given value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Essentially, it is a ceil operation across the domain of powers of two.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UINT64&#95;C(1) &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a238ef12f09938dac4efe5ca56dc125d9">Log2&#95;64&#95;Ceil</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns the integer ceil(Numerator / Denominator). Unsigned version.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T = common&#95;u</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;U, V&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Numerator - Bias) / Denominator + Bias;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Fallback when arguments aren&#39;t integral.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64d0d2b3bdaf218872f93a90dfb1b05"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(uint64&#95;t Numerator, uint64&#95;t Denominator) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether divideCeilSigned or divideFloorSigned would overflow. This</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Skew mod \\p A&#39;. \\p Align must be non-zero.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because it fails for uint16&#95;t (where multiplication can have undefined</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the multiplication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Overflowed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Log2(Z) would be either Log2Z or Log2Z + 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case: if X or Y is 0, Log2&#95;64 gives -1, and Log2Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will necessarily be less than Log2Max as desired.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Log2Z = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">Log2&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">Log2&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> Max = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;T&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Log2Max = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">Log2&#95;64</a>(Max);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Log2Z &lt; Log2Max) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re going to use the top bit, and maybe overflow one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bit past it. Multiply all but the bottom bit then add</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> Z = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> &gt;&gt; 1) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Multiply two signed integers, computing the two&#39;s complement truncated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// result, returning true if an overflow ocurred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a073e9e9c9d16980286268ddb7cf3e2d9"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;std::is&#95;signed&#95;v&lt;T&gt;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a073e9e9c9d16980286268ddb7cf3e2d9">MulOverflow</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;Result) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform the unsigned multiplication on absolute values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">U = std::make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;T&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U UX = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> &lt; 0 ? (0 - </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">U</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>)) : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">U</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U UY = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a> &lt; 0 ? (0 - </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">U</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>)) : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">U</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U UResult = UX &#42; UY;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert to signed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsNegative = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> &lt; 0) ^ (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a> &lt; 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result = IsNegative ? (0 - UResult) : UResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If any of the args was 0, result is 0 and no overflow occurs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UX == 0 || UY == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UX and UY are in &#91;1, 2^n&#93;, where n is the number of digits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check how the max allowed absolute value (2^n for negative, 2^(n-1) for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// positive) divided by an argument compares to the other.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsNegative)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UX &gt; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">U</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;T&gt;::max()) + U(1)) / UY;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UX &gt; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">U</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;T&gt;::max())) / UY;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Type to force float point values onto the stack, so that x86 doesn&#39;t add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// hidden precision, avoiding rounding differences on various platforms.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;i386&#95;&#95;) || defined(&#95;M&#95;IX86)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adb9957c51388634835e450bf34e02729">stack&#95;float&#95;t</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">volatile</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> float;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adb9957c51388634835e450bf34e02729"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adb9957c51388634835e450bf34e02729">stack&#95;float&#95;t</a> = float;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"></CodeLine>
